HEAD:
<head>
<title>SILTA - Simple Localized Tasks</title>
<link rel='icon' type='image/x-icon' href='data:,'>
<meta name='viewport' content='initial-scale=1.0, width=device-width'>
<meta charset='UTF-8'>
<!-- SILTA TrueBlue EN -->
<style>
body {
	font-family: Arimo,Arial,FreeSans,Helvetica,sans-serif;
	font-weight: 400;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #000;
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
	line-height: 1.3;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
hr {color: #fff;}
#page {
	position: relative;
	z-index: 100;
	width: 100%;
	max-width: 1000px;
	background: #fff;
	margin: 0 auto;
}
#topmenu {
	box-shadow: -2000px 0px RoyalBlue,-1000px 0px RoyalBlue,1000px 0px RoyalBlue,2000px 0px RoyalBlue;
	z-index: 10;
	color: #fff;
	background: RoyalBlue;
	margin-bottom: 1.3em;
	height: 50px;
	position: sticky;
	top: 0;
}
#topmenu .nav_wrap {
	display: flex;
	flex-flow: row wrap;
	width: 100%;
}
#topmenu .nav_left, #topmenu .nav_right {
	flex: 0 0 50%;
	max-width: 50%;
	position: relative;
}
#topmenu .nav_logo, #topmenu .nav_menu {
	display: inline-block;
	height: 50px;
	width: 35px;
	line-height: 1.7;
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 30px;
	position: absolute;
}
#topmenu a, #topmenu a:link {text-decoration: none;color: #fff;}
#topmenu .nav_logo {left: 0em;}
#topmenu .nav_menu {right: 0.3em;}
#topmenu .icon {display: block;margin: auto auto;}
#page a {text-decoration: none; color: inherit;}
#page a:hover {text-decoration: underline;}
.deny {color: #2E86C1;cursor: not-allowed;}
.inln {display: inline-block;}
.full {width: 100%;}
.cour {font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;font-size: 18px;}
.grid {
	--sizing: auto-fit;
	display: grid;
	grid-template-columns: repeat(var(--sizing), minmax(384px, 1fr));
	grid-gap: 1rem;
}
.view {background-color: #5DADE2;color: white;}
.data {
	border: 4px solid #5DADE2;
	border-radius: 12px;
	padding: 16px 32px;
	margin: 4px 2px;
}
.blue {background-color: RoyalBlue;color: white;}
@keyframes blinker {
	0% {opacity: 0;}
	100% {opacity: 1;}
}
#note a {text-decoration: underline;color: inherit;}
.notf {
	color: white;
	border-radius: 12px;
	padding: 16px 32px;
	margin: 4px 2px;
	animation: blinker 0.6s linear 2;
}
.fail {
	background-color: #E74C3C;
	border: 1px solid #E74C3C;
	animation: blinker 0.6s linear 2;
}.warn {
	background-color: #EBB31A;
	border: 1px solid #EBB31A;
	animation: blinker 0.6s linear 2;
}
.info {background-color: #2ECC71;border: 1px solid #2ECC71;}
.oflw {
	overflow: hidden;
	max-width: 70%;
}
.hova:hover {
	color: white;
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 4px solid Blue;
	background-color: Blue;
}
.hova > a {pointer-events: auto;}
.fixw {width: 20%;}
.mgnl {margin-left: 20px;}
.bold {font-weight: bold;font-size: 22px;}
.norm {font-weight: normal;}
.cent {text-align: center;}
.fltr {float: right;margin-left: 32px;}

.dropbtn {
	background-color: inherit;
	color: inherit;
	border: none;
	cursor: pointer;
}
.dropbtn:hover, .dropbtn:focus {background-color: inherit;}
.dropdown {
	position: relative;
	display: inline-block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 400;
}
.dropdown-content {
	display: none;
	position: absolute;
	min-width: 128px;
	overflow: auto;
	box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	z-index: 1;
}
.dropdown-right {margin: 16px 0;right: 4px;}
.dropdown-content a {
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 400;
	padding: 6px 8px;
	text-decoration: none;
	display: block;
}
.dropdown-content a:hover {background-color: Blue;}

input[type=text], input[type=password], select {
	font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
	font-size: 18px;
	width: 100%;
	padding: 6px 8px;
	margin: 8px 0;
	display: inline-block;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	border-radius: 4px;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}
textarea {width: 100%;resize: none;}
.button {
	background-color: inherit;
	border: none;
	color: inherit;
	padding: 0px 0px;
	text-align: center;
	text-decoration: none;
	display: inline-block;
	font-size: 16px;
	margin: 0px 0px;
	cursor: pointer;
}
.back {cursor: alias;}
.hand {color: inherit; cursor: pointer;}
.show {display: block;}
.hide {display: none;}
.clck {cursor: pointer;}
.clck:hover {text-decoration: underline;
}
input:required:focus {
	border: 2px solid red;
}

.switch {
	position: relative;
	display: inline-block;
	width: 50px;
	height: 24px;
	pointer-events: auto;
}

.switch input {
	opacity: 0;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
}


.slider {
	position: absolute;
	cursor: pointer;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	background-color: #ccc;
	-webkit-transition: .4s;
	transition: .4s;
}
.slider:before {
	position: absolute;
	content: '';
	height: 16px;
	width: 16px;
	left: 4px;
	bottom: 4px;
	background-color: white;
	-webkit-transition: .4s;
	transition: .4s;
}
input:checked + .slider {background-color: #2196F3;}
input:focus + .slider {box-shadow: 0 0 1px #2196F3;}
input:checked + .slider:before {
	-webkit-transform: translateX(26px);
	-ms-transform: translateX(26px);
	transform: translateX(26px);
}

.slider.round {border-radius: 24px;}
.slider.round:before {border-radius: 50%;}
</style>
<script>
function showdiv(show_id, hide_id) {
	if (show_id != '') {document.getElementById(show_id).style.display = 'block';}
	if (hide_id != '') {document.getElementById(hide_id).style.display = 'none';}
}
function fsubmit(form) {
	document.getElementById(form).submit();
}
function fmval(form, msg, n, v) {
	if (confirm(msg)) {
		f = document.getElementById(form);
		x = document.createElement('input');
		x.name=n;
		x.type='hidden';
		x.value = v;
		f.appendChild(x);
		f.submit();
	};
}

function doDrop(menu) {
	document.getElementById(menu).classList.toggle('show');
}

window.onclick = function(event) {
	if (!event.target.matches('.dropbtn')) {
		var dropdowns = document.getElementsByClassName('dropdown-content');
		var i;
		for (i = 0; i < dropdowns.length; i++) {
			var openDropdown = dropdowns[i];
			if (openDropdown.classList.contains('show')) {
				openDropdown.classList.remove('show');
			}
		}
	}
}
function selectText(elem) {
	var copyText = document.getElementById(elem);
	copyText.select();
}
</script>
</head>
TASK:
{task_name}
{timestamp}
